Eva's Spirit Lanya: Hi! I am Lanya, servant to Goddess Eva. Oh,you brought some water from the Hot Springs? Excellent, They say water from the Hot Springs is good for making weapons. Now, onto your next mission for Goddess Eva.Please get me the second material for the weapon for purifying water. Are you ready? [Quest Q10369_NoblesseSoulTesting Lanya-2.htm|"Say you are ready"]
